UL.LI: Explain why all real engines are less efficient than the Carnot engine
In a real engine does the gas inside the piston return to its original state on completion of a cycle as happens in the Carnot cycle? Explain your reasoning
Give a mathematical expression for the second law of thermodynamics
Explain in your own words how the mathematical expression you just arrived at for the second law of thermodynamics is derived from the Clausius Inequality.
